name: Rebrand Amelia
author: RebrandPress

sections.description: Amelia is an automated booking specialist that allows customers to book appointments or make payments with a simple plugin. Thanks to Rebrand Amelia, you can remove any Amelia branded colors or messaging and replace it with your own. Change the plugin’s name and description and make the calendar look like it’s native to your website, among other features.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater

Installation

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress(This will add new Sub Menu in admin panel’s side menu name Rebrand` under Amelia menu).
  3. Go to Amelia > Rebrand
sections.faq:
1. Is the Rebrand Amelia plugin free?
    -Yes, we have a lite version of Rebrand Amelia plugin with limited features. If you want to take advantage of all the premium features you’ll need to purchase a Pro license.

  2. Can you use the Rebrand Amelia plugin on the free version of Amelia?
    -Yes, it will work with both free version and pro version.

  3. Does it work with any WordPress theme?
    -Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

  4. Does it work with any WordPress page builder?
    -Yes, it will work with any WordPress page builder.

  5. How many websites can I connect Rebrand Amelia to?
    -You can connect the lite version to as many websites you would like. If you want to use the Pro features, you’ll have to select the plan that fits your needs best.

  6. Where can I get support?
    -You can post your question on the support forum here: https://help.rebrandpress.com.
